Hello dear user brother,

More than 17 months have already passed from the debut of the application He Rose from Death on the Android PlayStore.
It is constantly updated, in the limits of the time available, and we try to adapt it as we can to your requests.

If this application has been useful to you and you liked it, you can phisically thank us through PlayStore, using the buttons at the page bottom (NOTE: 30% goes to Google).

We clarify that the application is NOT for pay and, making a donation, does not grant you any added function.
It is simply a way to recognise the usefullness of the application and reward a bit the time spent to improve it day by day.

I thank you in advance for your generosity.

Peace.
MARBAT87
